text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 409822003 (Domain Bacteria (organism))
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 441649000 (Class Cestoda and/or Class Trematoda and/or Phylum Nemata (organism))
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 414561005 (Kingdom Fungi (organism))
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 84676004 (Prion)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 49872002 (Virus)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 417396000 (Kingdom Protozoa (organism))
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 419036000 (Superkingdom Archaea)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 426785004 (Kingdom Chromista (organism))
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 370570004 (Kingdom Protista)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 417377004 (Kingdom Viridiplantae (organism))
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 243565002 (Slime mold)

name: ResultsMicroorganismUvIps
title: Results Microorganism - IPS
publisher: Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group
description: This is a value set of the SNOMED CT microorganism concepts for use in the Results section observation values.
